mainTitle: Expand Your Photography Career with Yogzan
mainDesc: Already a skilled photographer and want to work on exciting projects while earning more? Join Yogzan and be part of our professional team.
workflowDesc: Fill out the available form to register as a Yogzan collaborator.

workflow.title: Receive Project
workflow.desc: Our team will contact you with detailed information about the project you will be working on.

workflow.title: Shoot and Send
workflow.desc: After completing the photo or video session, send all the results to Yogzan via Yogzan’s cloud storage access.

workflow.title: Receive Commission
workflow.desc: Once we have received the photos, please wait to receive your commission within 1 to 2 days.

joinDesc: We can’t wait to get to know you. Fill out the form below!

chooseUs.title: Flexible Schedule
chooseUs.desc: Have another job? No problem. You can work on each project whenever you are ready.

chooseUs.title: Clients Everywhere
chooseUs.desc: Yogzan has many clients spread across major cities in Indonesia, Malaysia & Singapore. Take on projects wherever you are.

chooseUs.title: Shoot. Send. Earn.
chooseUs.desc: You simply execute the shoot on site, send the results, and receive your commission. We will take care of the rest.

chooseUs.title: Develop Your Skills
chooseUs.desc: With the many projects at Yogzan, you will gain valuable experience to produce your best work. You will also receive exclusive training from Yogzan to further enhance your skills.
